title: Got low priority because Modem Died
body: So, i was a bout 5 minutes into a game, was going okay, then BAM, internet dies, baby is crying, life flips upside down for about an hour, and i could not get my laptop to connect to my internet, two laptops adn a phone werent finding or connecting to the network, and then once i log on i get placed in 20min low priority queues for 5 games, that mean in all im basically banned for an hour for something out of my contorl. Riot please hear me out, if I cant do anything about it, then why do i have an hour of my time banned? and of course the arbitrary "why is it not just 2 or three day ban" question, becausei honestly can not understand why its a five game ban. thanks if it is resolved. I'd give a better insight into my life but you probably wont want to hear it. <3 keep up the good work guys.

replies.body: Someone said this on another thread talking about this issue, you agree to the EULA and TOU that you have a sufficient internet connection that's stable and able to support the game. It's your responsibility, not Riot's, therefore theres nothing they can do. Just deal with it.
Yeah i guess I'll have to, i cant wait for the nbn in the end.

I've been waiting ages for NBN too T_T
Government pls!

You're am adult right? If you're constantly leaving work early or coming late, even if they are valid reasons, you're going to get fired. 20 minute low priority queue means either you have, left games before in the past or the internet has cut out multiple times. 

AFKing makes the game unfair for everyone, and it is not an acceptable way to handle harassment in-game. We have mute buttons on every player, I recommend you use these in the future. 

As for technical issues you might be having, you should make sure to play under the best conditions possible. I know this isn't always achievable and stuff happens, but you just have to accept this as a consequence of bad internet.
You don't get low priority for a single incident. More than likely you've had several leaves prior, and you should really look into fixing the cause instead of trying to weasel out of punishment.
your modern is your responsibility, so you're gonna have to cop a punishment when it fails.

Just a revisit to this as being 3 years... got low priority because of NBN. Net went out across the block. I get the EULA, but thats messed up. I felt bad for my team. wish they could penalise the idiot that crashed into the node.
You wouldn't get LPQ unless you have a history of leaving to begin with. Shit happens, everyone knows that, but if you're leaving for other reasons a lot, you've used up all your free passes.
oh I agree, Its still my net though, Im not just walking away. Optus is so bad in my area and its not like a consistent block thats bad. happens randomly all the time.

feeders gave me low priority 
but allowing us to leave in champ select is giving power to the trolls

tobe honest, most of the time its because i've had enough, i use league to get away form normal day to da, and yes i know i have left games before, and yes more than once its been on purpose. But these incidents are months apart, im trying my best to control my anger, and if i have to leave the game to stop being abused because im not a great mid laner, or because i made a bad play, then i will leave games, ivenever left a ranked game and hate when people leave games for no reason, but if i cant even give a reason to my team before i afk, then im sorry that my net is a piece of gak. I'll be so happy when nbn is rolled out.
